sentences: In August 2008 Luis-Bassa appeared in the reality TV talent show-themed television series, Maestro on BBC Two, as a mentor to David Soul.
She also conducted the Main Orchestra playing Danzon No. 2 by Arturo MÃ¡rquez in the Summer Concert of 2011, and again playing Sibelius Symphony 2 in 2014.
She is renowned among the NCO for her flamboyant conducting.
Her father, Germinal, was born in Barcelona, Spain.

As a child, during the Spanish Civil War, he had to escape from Barcelona and went to France, the United States, Argentina and finally Venezuela where he married Lillian, a Venezuelan whose parents were Spanish.
She is a graduate of the Royal College of Music in London.
Luis-Bassa now lives in West Yorkshire, the "Last of the Summer Wine" county.
